Pre-Game Insights: The Rockets didn't put Reed Sheppard on the floor in the first quarter.
The Golden State Warriors secured a huge 38-20 lead despite not having their star player.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Reed Sheppard played only five minutes against the Dallas Mavericks in the last game.
Reed Sheppard had significant playing time in his first two NBA games.
Others: Reed Sheppard's opportunities to play on the hardwood have been very few so far.
